alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:02PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Catoosa, north central Murray, northern Whitfield, central Walker and Dade Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1002 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hicks Gap State Park, or 8 miles east of Jasper, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Varnell, Lookout Mountain, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Chattanooga Valley, La Fayette, Gregory, Blue Spring, Fairview, Beaverdale, Chattanooga Valley, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights and Rock Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
